name: tentree TreeBlend Classic Long-Sleeve Top - Men's
description:
Classic long-sleeve tee comfort taken to the next level with tentree’s ultra-soft triblend jersey.tentree's signature soft triblend jersey.Regular fit wears like an old fave.tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that 10 trees are planted for every article of clothing sold.
